document.full_text: an air strike by nato-led forces killed two children as they were watering fields in afghanistan's eastern kunar province late on monday, an afghan official and lawmaker said.
document.title: nato air strike killed two afghan children in east: officials
lines_and_colors: an air strike by nato-led forces killed two children as they were watering fields in afghanistan's eastern kunar province late on monday, an afghan official and lawmaker said.
